document_data.name: Missing Word
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Missing word''''' was a [[divination]] [[spell]] used by the [[church of Oghma|clergy]] of [[Oghma]] to beseech their deity for lost or obscured information.

This spell was held with some reverence by the Oghman clergy. Its overuse was looked upon poorly by the Lord of Knowledge.
document_data.Effects:
This spell was used when by Oghman [[cleric]]s when encountered an illustration, inscription or other written document that was missing a significant portion. It could even be used to make whole an incomplete spell incantation.

When this spell was cast, the cleric was surrounded by a purple-white aura. Either the spell succeeded, and the missing information was temporarily revealed, or it failed, and cleric merely received a brief vision.
document_data.History: The specifications of this spell could be revealed upon a surface by the Oghman [[relic]], the ''[[Key of Faith]]''.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s in order to be cast.
